name: Credits Jam Game V.1
description:
CREDIT JAM GAME

Controls:  Arrow Keys left up and right to make JumpMan move and jump.

Rules: Keep JumpMan in the center zone for as long as you can ! If He hits the top or bottom of the credits page he will be destroyed!

(This game was made in a few hours by medwards art  for the https://itch.io/jam/creditsjam )
